fulltext:
Trương Huy Cường
SENIOR TEAM LEADER
Career Objective
I graduated from Chi Minh City University of Transport in 2014. My major are website
development, project management. Now I’m looking for a position as a Team Leader/PM. 
I would appreciate the opportunity to interview with you at your convenience and hope you
will satisfy with my professional experience.
 Education
BACHELOR OF
2009 - 2014
Insititution: Ho Chi Minh city University of Transport
Location: Ho Chi Minh city
Graduated Date: Jan 2014
Major: Graduate of information technology engineer
Nov 23, 1991
 Male

0977 538 528

cuong.truonghuy@gmail.com
Technical Skills
Program Languages: PHP (Laravel, cake PHP, codeigniter,...), CMS (Wordpress), Android, C#,
JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, HTML5, CSS, BOOSTRAP 4. 
Frontend: Reactjs
Knowledge: RESTful API programming, Google Maps APIs 
RDBMS: SQL Server, MySQL. 
Development Tools: JetBrains (storm) Visual Studio, Visual Code.
Source code storage : Git, svn 
Manage task : Jira, Redmine

HCM, Vietnam

[protected data]
SKILLS
PHP
Mysql/SQL server
Javascript/HTML/CSS
ReactJs
git/svn
UI/UX
Management
Work Experience
NORDIC CODER
AUG 2018 - PRESENT
Senior Developer
Platform of nordic Coder (Aug 2018 - Present)
Project Description: E-commerce platform that provides online and offline courses. System
can send emails, make online payment, view transactions, and link to another system for
learning courses.
Team Size: 5
Technical stacks: PHP, Mysql, CMS wordpress, Woocommerce, Cloudflare, Memcache, W3
Total Cached, Google Cloud Server.
Responsibilities:
- Managed development process and tasks
- Reviewed code- Code API call to online course.
- Developed API transaction to third parties
- Developed layout and theme with Bootstrap based on design
- Deployed and maintained servers
EDX (Jan 2019 - Present)
Project Description: A learning management system (LMS) for students to learn online.
Team Size: 4
Technical stacks: Edx platform built on Python, Bootstrap CSS, Google Cloud Server. 
Responsibilities:
- Managed development process and tasks
- Reviewed UI/UX and got feedbacks from student
INTERESTS
Soccer
Music
Travel
Movie
- Deployed and maintained servers
YELLOW'S VIET NAM
FEB 2015 - JUL 2018
Senior Dev/Team Leader
Windhill version 2 (Jun 2018 - Jul 2018)
Project Description: An ecommerce website that allows people to book and pay fee for their
rented house. The version 2 is to update function and design from version 1.
Project Team Size: 03
Technical stacks: PHP,  Mysql, Bootstrap. 
Responsibilities:
- Analyzed requirements of project
- Managed development process and tasks of team members
- Developed layout and theme based on design
Clean Asuka (Jan 2018 - May 2018)
Project Description:User can use provided services from website. Admin can add, edit and
delete services. Furthermore, website was optimized SEO for all pages.
Team Size: 04
Technical stacks: Laravel PHP, Mysql, Bootstrap.
Responsibilities:
- Analyzed requirements of project
- Estimated timeline for scope of work
- Backend : 
     + Developed functions for admin dashboard
- Fronent : 
    + Developed layout and theme with Bootstrap based on design
Nissenren (Jan 2017 - Jan 2018)
Project Description: User can see image of house on website and mobile with image 360
degree. And user can see house on application through VR device.
Technical stacks: Laravel PHP, MySQL, Unity C#
Team Size: 05
Responsibilities: 
- Analyzed requirements of project
- Managed development process and tasks of team members 
- Backend : 
    + Developed functions for admin dashboard to manage house and upload 360 images
    + Developed API for application
- Frontend:
    + Developed layout and theme based on design
- Unity:
    + Developed functions for rendering 360 images to sphere objects
Hanyu school
Date: May 2016 - Oct 2016
Project Description: An application on Android and website to show bus position and time
when the bus is coming to pickup pupils to school. The system will send notification when
bus is coming.
Technical stacks: Laravel, MySQL and Android
Project Team Size: 04
Responsibilities: 
- Backend : 
    + Developed functions for managing websites
    + Developed API service for mobile 
- Frontend:
    + Developed layout and theme based on design from Illustrator file
- Android:
    + Developed function for maps of bus position and notification service
Windhill (Sep 2015 - Mar 2016)
Project Description: An ecommerce website that allows people to book and pay fee for their
rented house.
Team Size: 03.
Technical stacks: PHP (MVC framework), MySQL
Responsibilities: 
- Backend 
    + Developed function for managing empty houses and arranging time for rent 
    + Developed API to connect to Paypal for payment 
- Frontend 
    + Developed layout and theme based on design from Photoshop
FOIS VIET NAM
APR 2014 - JAN 2015
Junior Dev
Hyaku real estate (Sep 2014 - Jan 2015)
Project Description: A web application for listing real estate within an area.
Technical stacks: CakePHP, MySQL
Team Size: 02
Responsibilities: 
- Backend
     + Implemented new function to get data from MySQL and exported selection to CSV file
Nidec (Jun 2014 - Sep 2014)
Project Description: A web application for managing timeline of employees.
Technical stacks: CakePHP, MySQL
Team Size: 04
Responsibilities: 
- Backend 
    + Developed function for admin to produce report of timeline
    + Developed function for managers and accountants to check timeline
    + Developed function for exporting payroll
- Frontend
    + Made adjustments to layout from designed theme
 Certifications
Certificate English Level B
2014
Certificate graduated C# by NIIT
2013
